sentence: "The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate."
author: Hannah Getahun
title: Trump endorsed Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania's Senate race

sentence: Stumping for North Carolina GOP Senate primary candidate Ted Budd, former President Donald Trump added an official endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania's hotly contested GOP Senate primary at Saturday's Save America rally.
author: Eric Mack
title: Trump: 'Right Now Our Country Is a Laughingstock'

sentence: President Trump vows to ‘demand justice for the Jan. 6 prisoners and full protection of their civil rights like was received by ANTIFA, Black Lives Matter who murdered people throughout our country.’ pic.twitter.com/I9VxV5zpjh President Trump: ‘We must ensure that every election can be FULLY and quickly audited.’ pic.twitter.com/9sWhOHumo6 Trump confirmed his endorsement for Dr. Mehmet Oz, in Pennsylvania, who is running for U.S. Senate.
author: DML News App
title: WATCH: Highlights from Trump’s speech at North Carolina rally

sentence: Trump: I’ve gotta be the cleanest— I think I’m the most honest human being perhaps that god ever created pic.twitter.com/D98itzA6vi — Acyn (@Acyn) April 10, 2022 If there was one bit of actual news to be gleaned from Trump’s North Carolina appearance last night, it was his endorsement of Dr. Mehmet Oz for the Republican nomination for Senator in Pennsylvania.
author: Vinnie Longobardo
title: FUTILE RAMBLINGS: Trump’s North Carolina rally provides him with ever diminishing returns

sentence: Trump has endorsed both men as he continues to throw his support behind various Republicans running, including recently Dr. Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania.
author: Zachary Leeman
title: Trump Rally in North Carolina Draws Fewer Than 2,000 People: Report
